securityGroupIds.description: ID of the security group or security groups associated with the Amazon VPC connected to the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

subnetIds.description: The ID of the subnet or subnets associated with the Amazon VPC connected to the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

tlsCertificate.description: The value of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) certificate associated with the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

vpcId.description: The ID of the Amazon VPC connected to the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.
